sentences.cn: 一月里一个阴冷的下午

sentences.en: Alberg gave him a bleak stare.
sentences.cn: 阿尔伯格沮丧地凝视着他。

sentences.en: Her book paints a bleak picture of the problems women now face.
sentences.cn: 她的书是女性当下所面临问题的凄凉写照。
很多人都预测前景暗淡。

sentences.en: That's probably the most bare and bleak island I've ever had the misfortune to clap eyes on.
sentences.cn: 那可能是我不幸看到的最光秃、最荒凉的岛屿。

sentences.en: That's probably the most bare, bleak, barren and inhospitable island I've ever seen.
sentences.cn: 那可能是我见过的最荒凉的岛屿，荒无人烟，寸草不生。

sentences.en: The company's prospects look pretty bleak.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的前景异常暗淡.

sentences.en: The report paints an unnecessarily bleak picture of the town.
sentences.cn: 这份报道把这个镇子描绘得过于惨淡.

sentences.en: The weather can be quite bleak on the coast.
sentences.cn: 沿海地区的天气会非常阴冷。

sentences.en: They showed me into a bleak waiting room.
sentences.cn: 他们引我来到一间阴冷的会客室.

words.tran_cn: 风吹雨打地；荒凉地；阴郁地
严寒；阴郁；萧瑟凄凉；惨淡无望

trans.tran_cn: 暗淡的，无望的，阴冷的，凄清的，沮丧的
trans.tran_en: cold and without any pleasant or comfortable features
